bug.author: nan-wang
bug.description:
The transformer with is broken. It might be related to the latest change of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/pull/764>#764</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>ERROR:transformers.tokenization_utils:Using eos_token, but it is not set yet. </denchmark-code>
Describe how you solve it <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Environment Screenshots â”†Issue is synchronized with this <denchmark-link:https://jinaai.atlassian.net/browse/JINACORE-149>Jira Bug</denchmark-link> by <denchmark-link:https://www.unito.io/learn-more>Unito</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Tests are still passing despite the warning. Are we sure it was not there before?

Tests are still passing despite the warning. Are we sure it was not there before?
I checked and in tag v0.4.1 the message was not being shown

it is not a critical error, and therefore it won't break the tests. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/blob/master/jina/executors/encoders/nlp/transformer.py#L83>https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/blob/master/jina/executors/encoders/nlp/transformer.py#L83</denchmark-link>
